messages.title: My contract with people across Camberwell and Peckham
messages.content: As a local resident, I know we deserve better from our MP. I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns and stand up for our communities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolishing university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.environment: Columba supported the 10:10 campaign for cuts on carbon emissions.
issues.governance: I will be a strong and independent voice for Camberwell and Peckham. I will open a high street constituency office and hold regular surgeries locally and at Westminster. I will fight to change the rotten expenses system and let people sack corrupt MPs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Columba has served our borough for nearly 12 years as a local councillor. He is the founder of the first African museum and in charge of Equality, Sports and Culture. He launched the Burgess Park Tennis Club. Now Chair of the Rotherhithe Community Council.

politicalExperience.achievements: Founder of the first African museum, in charge of Equality, Sports, and Culture, launched the Burgess Park Tennis Club, now Chair of the Rotherhithe Community Council.

images.caption: Columba with the Liberal Democrats' commitment to cut carbon by 10% by 2010

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Lib Dem difference: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services. We will put more police on patrol, restore the pensions’ earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces. We have identified real savings to pay for it. The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country’s books after the recession.
